thread.title: The Age Music Victoria Awards Competition 2015: terms and conditions
thread.title_full: The Age Music Victoria Awards Competition 2015: terms and conditions

author: canberratimes.com.au
title: The Age Music Victoria Awards Competition 2015: terms and conditions
text:
Win tickets to The Age Music Victoria Awards concert on November 11. Photo: Minas Panagiotakis 
Fairfax Media Publications Pty Ltd 
The Age Music Victoria Awards Competition Terms and Conditions 
1. Information on how to enter forms part of the terms of entry. Entry into the competition is deemed acceptance of these terms and conditions. Any entry not complying with these Terms and Conditions is invalid. If there is any conflict between these Terms and Conditions and any other published material, these Terms and Conditions will prevail.
2. All entries will be subject to The Age website terms of use which can be found at http://www.fairfax.com.au/conditions.html
Advertisement 3. Employees and their immediate families of the Promoter, and their associated agencies and companies connected with this competition are not eligible to win the prizes associated with The Age Music Victoria Awards promotion.
4. Entry is open to Victorian residents only. Proof of residency may be required to claim the prize.
5. The competition commences on Friday 9 October at 9:00am (AEDT) and concludes on Friday 6 November at 5:00pm (AEDT) ('competition period').
6. Entrants must be 18 years or over to enter. Proof of age may be required to claim the prize.
7. Entrants in the competition may only enter once.
8. Incomprehensible and incomplete entries will be deemed invalid.
9. This competition is a game of chance and the winner will be selected at random.
10. The Promoter reserves the right to verify the validity of entries, disqualify any entry which, in the opinion of Promoter, includes objectionable content, profanity, potentially insulting, inflammatory or defamatory statements and to disqualify any entrant who tampers with the entry process, who submits an entry that is not in accordance with these Terms & Conditions of Entry, who provides incorrect or invalid details or who has, in the opinion of Promoter, engaged in conduct in entering the Promotion which is fraudulent, misleading, deceptive or generally damaging to the goodwill or reputation of the Promotion and/or Promoter. The Promoter reserves the right to disqualify a winner if Promoter becomes aware that the winner and/or the winner's entry is of a type described in this clause.
11. Entries must be received by 5:00pm (AEDT) on Friday 6 November 2015 to be eligible for the competition.
12. If you opted in to subscribe to the Music Victoria newsletter, you agree to receive future communications from Music Victoria.
13. If you opted in to subscribe to The Age Entertainment newsletter, you agree to receive future communications from The Age.
14. The Promoter accepts no responsibility for any late, lost or misdirected entries including entries not received by the Promoter or delays in the delivery of the entry due to technical disruptions, network congestion or for any other reason.
15. To be eligible to win the entrant must, during the competition period, vote in the eleven (11) categories for The Age Music Victoria Awards and complete all required fields on the page which is hosted by and can be accessed via: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/V9TMPK6.
16. Entries are deemed to be received at the time when all required fields on the form which is hosted by and can be accessed via: https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/V9TMPK6 are completed and then the form is submitted via the Survey Monkey voting page.
17. The cost of entering the competition may be dependent on the entrant's individual Internet Service Provider and/or other service provider and entrants are solely responsible for any and all costs of any kind in relation to their entries.
18. There will be one (1) prize winner who will win the following: ï‚· Two (2) VIP tickets to The Age Music Victoria Awards on Wednesday 11 November at 170 Russell. Ticket price is valued at $40 (incl GST). Total prize value is $80 (incl GST).
19. The winner will be randomly selected at 10am (AEDT) on Monday 9 November 2015 at Media House, Level 3, 655 Collins St, Docklands 3008.
20. Prizes are non-redeemable and non-transferable and will be awarded only to the entrant declared as the winner. The prize is non-transferable for cash or any other replacement request.
21. By entering this competition, entrants accept and acknowledge full responsibility for their decision to participate in the prize should they be chosen as the winner. The winner release the promoter and other organisers, their related bodies corporate, affiliates, officers, agents and employees, from all liabilities, loss and damage of any kind arising at any time out of or in connection with the acceptance of, and participation in, the prize. Without limiting the foregoing, the released parties will not be liable for any injury, sickness or death, property loss or damage or other direct or indirect loss or damage of any kind, howsoever sustained or incurred, in connection with or arising out of the prize or any other aspect of the prize. The winner acknowledges that they have been warned that there is a possibility of an accident causing injury, death or property damage in accepting the prize.
22. If the prize is unavailable, for whatever reason, the Promoter reserves the right to substitute the prize for a prize of equal or greater value.
23. In consideration for the Promoter awarding the prize to the winner, the winner hereby permits the winner's image and/or voice, as recorded, photographed or filmed during the winner's participation in the prize to appear in connection with The Promoter or the advertising or marketing thereof, in any media whatsoever throughout the world and the winner will not be entitled to any fee for such use.
24. In the event that for any reason whatsoever a winner does not take an element of the prize at the time stipulated by the Promoter then that element of the prize will be forfeited by the winner and cash will not be awarded in lieu of that element of the prize.
25. Prize values are based upon the recommended retail prices at the time of printing (inclusive of GST). The promoter accepts no responsibility for change in prize value between now and the ultimate prize redemption date.
26. The winner will be notified within 24 hours of the winner being declared via the email address provided at the time the entrant enters the competition.
27. The winner will be announced publicly on The Age Australia Facebook Page.
28. Prize will be deemed to be accepted/claimed once Fairfax Media and the winner have established contact and promoter has verified any details deemed necessary in accordance with these terms.
29. The Promoter reserves the right to declare another winner in the event of the winner not claiming the Prize by 10am on Wednesday 11 November. If the Prize remains unclaimed or forfeited through ineligibility or otherwise, at 11am on Wednesday 11 November at Media House, Level 3, 655 Collins St, Docklands 3008, another entrant will be randomly selected as the replacement winner. The replacement winner will be notified immediately via the email address provided at the time the entrant enters the competition.
30. Should an entrant's contact details change during the promotional period, it is the entrant's responsibility to notify the Promoter. A request to access or modify any information provided in an entry should be directed to Promoter. The Promoter shall bear no liability whatsoever for any loss, damage, cost, expense or liability of an entrant arising in connection with incorrect contact details or the entrant's failure to adequately notify Promoter of any change in any such details.
31. The Promoter's decision in relation to all matters is final and the promoter will not enter into correspondence regarding the competition result.
32. It is a condition of accepting the prize that the winner must comply with all the conditions of use of the prize and the prize supplier's requirements.
33. In the case of the intervention of any outside act, agent or event which prevents or significantly hinders the Promoter's ability to proceed with the competition on the dates and in the manner described in these terms and conditions, including but not limited to vandalism, power failures, tempests, natural disasters, acts of God, civil unrest, strike, war, act of terrorism, the Promoter may in its absolute discretion cancel the competition and recommence it from the start on the same conditions, subject to any directions given under State Regulation.
34. The Promoter shall not be liable for any loss or damage whatsoever which is suffered (including but not limited to indirect or consequential loss) or for any personal injury suffered or sustained in connection with any prize/s except for any liability which cannot be excluded by law. The Promoter is not responsible for any incorrect or inaccurate information, either caused by website users or by any of the equipment or programming associated with or utilised in this competition, or for any technical error, or any combination thereof that may occur in the course of the administration of this competition including any omission, interruption, deletion, defect, delay in operation or transmission, communications line or telephone, mobile or satellite network failure, theft or destruction or unauthorised access to or alteration of entries.
35. The Promoter reserves the right in its sole discretion to disqualify any individual who the Promoter has reason to believe has breached any of these conditions, or engaged in any unlawful or other improper misconduct calculated to jeopardise the fair and proper conduct of the promotion. The Promoter's legal rights to recover damages or other compensation from such an offender are reserved.
36. The Promoter and their associated agencies and companies assume no responsibility for any error, omission, interruption, deletion, defect, delay in operation or transmission; communications line failure, theft or destruction or unauthorised access to, or alteration of entries, and reserves the right to take any action that may be available.
37. If for any reason this competition is not capable of running as planned, including due to infection by computer virus, bugs, tampering, unauthorised intervention, fraud, technical failures or any causes beyond the control of the Promoter, which corrupt or affect the administration, security, fairness or integrity or proper conduct of this promotion, the Promoter reserves the right in its sole discretion to disqualify any individual who tampers with the entry process, take any action that may be available, and to cancel, terminate, modify or suspend the competition, subject to any direction given under State Regulation.
38. All entries become the property of the Promoter and may be republished and reproduced by The Promoter and its partners. By submitting an entry, the entrant irrevocably assigns all intellectual property in his or her entry to the Promoter, and will do all things and execute all documents required to effect such assignment and consent to waive any moral rights the participant may have in their entry.
39. The Promoter collects personal information about you to enable you to participate in this promotion and for other purposes as stated in these conditions, and may use such information in accordance with its privacy policy, which is available at http://www.fairfax.com.au/privacy.html.
40. The Promoter is Fairfax Media Publications Pty Ltd, (ABN: 33 003 357 720) of 1 Darling Island Road, Pyrmont, NSW 2009.
